comment.author: Brandon
comment.text: Awwww, come on people. Let the trolls stay. It's the only time they will hear the truth. Besides, their candidate isn't talking. She's taking yet another rest.

replies.author: Bradly
replies.text: Your man is 120 electoral points behind

replies.author: Jeran
replies.text: Polls don't mean anything dog. Guess you havnt been around for a while.

replies.author: Christopher
replies.text: They will find out soon enough President Trump will lock her lying corrupt butt up.
